title: Gemini Nano
welcome_unavailable:
Unfortunately either your device doesn't support Gemini Nano or the Google AICore is unavailable to the app. For more information, trouleshooting steps and to report issues, please visit the GitHub repository.

For more information about Gemini Nano availability, please visit the MLKit GenAI documentation.
welcome_download:
Gemini Nano is available, but the AI Core doesn't have it locally.
The model is being downloaded now, afterwards you will be able to use it without the internet. Usually the model is %size% big, but it depends on device and model version.
The AI Core will manage and update the model in background after it downloads it.
welcome_available: Currently, Gemini Nano is offered in alpha version and there is a limit of tokens per minute. It may break or produce unexpected results. Please report any issues you encounter on the GitHub repository and remember that AI may make mistakes. Content AI generates does not reflect opinion of the app developer or Google.
settings_info:
App in development. Please report all errors, mistranslations and leave any feedback on GitHub

Developed by Puzzak, %year%
instructions_desc:
The system prompt describes model's behavior. You cannot change it, but you can recommend changes on GitHub.

It contains user prompt - you can edit it. This will fine-tune model's behavior to your liking.
recommend_changes_gh: You can recommend changes in the GitHub repository
ai_may_not_differ_prompt_and_instruction: Gemini may not differentiate between prompt and instructions.
no_context_yet: AI Early Access. Model may make mistakes and not respond.
waiting_for_AI: Waiting for Gemini to start generating. If you see this message for longer than expected, this could mean either some error occurred with ML Kit or you've hit the quota (in which case just wait a minute and try again).
whoops: Tap to check the AI Core
add_lang_desc: Ask the model to speak it
welcome:
Mock conversation.
Please remember that AI can make mistakes and ignore you. Find more info in settings.
I hope you will enjoy the experience - Puzzak :)
mock_gemini_1: Hi! I'm Gemini Nano, an AI model that runs 100% locally on your device. Since I'm always *in-house*, your data stays private and I work offline.
mock_gemini_2: I can help you with all sorts of tasks, like summarizing text, brainstorming ideas, writing code, or answering complex questions.
mock_user_3: Okay, explain 'quantum computing' in one simple sentence.
mock_gemini_3: It's a type of computing that uses quantum physics to solve problems too complex for regular computers. It's a fascinating topic, even if it's a *bit* hard to grasp!
